previewPlan.name: GUSTO io
previewPlan.planDescription: If you are a Sufferlandrians/Wahooligan assigned to group 'GUSTO I/O' this is the plan for you.

prospects.name: Primers
prospects.description: Whether you have a 4DP® fitness test coming up, a group ride you want to smash, that event you have been training all winter for, or even just a fun route you want to have a great ride on, this is the perfect session to do the day before. Unlike other SYSTM sessions, this one should not be viewed as a stand-alone “training” session, but rather, the ace up your sleeve you pull out when that big ride comes around. The key to this session is having you spend just enough time right around threshold, with sufficient recovery between efforts and a handful of sprints to prime all of your systems for tomorrow's event.

prospects.name: [WSS] Full Access
prospects.description: Alternative to FF and HM to get full access to 4DP

prospects.name: Primers
prospects.description: Whether you have a 4DP® fitness test coming up, a group ride you want to smash, that event you have been training all winter for, or even just a fun route you want to have a great ride on, this is the perfect session to do the day before. Unlike other SYSTM sessions, this one should not be viewed as a stand-alone “training” session, but rather, the ace up your sleeve you pull out when that big ride comes around. The key to this session is having you spend just enough time right around threshold, with sufficient recovery between efforts and a handful of sprints to prime all of your systems for tomorrow's event.

prospects.name: [WSS] Full Access Outdoors
prospects.description:
Ride easy to the location of the 3min/8min section of road you will use.  
During the ride over complete a 30-second cadence build starting around 90rpm and climbing to your absolute max.  
This is best done on a slight downhill. The goal is peak cadence, not power, so you should be in an easy gear.  
During that ride over complete 2 x 7-second maximal sprints with 3 minutes of easy spinning between the two  
Spin easy for another 3-5 minutes before starting the 3-minute effort.  
Complete a maximal 3-minute effort  
Spin easy for 3 minutes (2-4 minutes is okay if that's how long it takes to ride easy to the start of the 20min section of road).  
Complete your maximal 8-minute effort.  
Spin easy for 6 minutes (3-5 minutes is okay if that's how long it takes to ride easy to the start of the 1min section of road).  
Complete your maximal 1-minute effort.  
Spin easy home to finish off the day.

prospects.name: Full Frontal (4DP Assessment)
prospects.description:
Full Frontal: The Complete One.

We recommend the Full Frontal 4DP fitness assessment for:

- Experienced riders.
- Athletes with experience pacing maximal efforts / fitness testing.
- Those about to start—or who have just finished—a training plan.

This is our full 4DP fitness test and is the only test that exposes every aspect of your unique physiology in a single hour. Developed by Head of Wahoo Sports Science Coach Neal Henderson, Full Frontal uses the same lab-verified testing protocol that Coach Neal has used at the highest level for over a decade with professional and amateur athletes.

​

This test will provide you with a complete Four-Dimensional Power profile, identify your Rider Type, and tell you exactly what aspects of your fitness you need to focus on to become a more complete cyclist. More importantly, SYSTM will then use your results to set personalized power targets for all of your workouts based on your unique profile, resulting in the most precise, effective workouts available. Your results will also be used to tailor all of your training plans.

​

We recommend re-testing with Full Frontal every 8-12 weeks or as prescribed by your training plan.

​

**LEARN MORE**

Listen to '[Why Fitness Testing Matters](https://the-knowledge-by-wahoo-sports-science.simplecast.com/episodes/testing-testing-1-2-3-why-fitness-testing-matters)' on The Knowledge Podcast by Wahoo Sports Science

​

[Here's some more information on how to get the most from your fitness test.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterFitnessAssessment)

Unlike other SYSTM sessions, this one should not be viewed as a stand-alone “training” session, but rather, the ace up your sleeve you pull out when that big ride comes around. The key to this session is having you spend just enough time right around threshold, with sufficient recovery between efforts and a handful of sprints to prime all of your systems for tomorrow's event.

prospects.name: [WSS] Full Frontal Outdoors
prospects.description:
Ride easy to the location of the 5min/20min section of road you will use. 
During that ride over complete 2 x 7-second maximal sprints with 3 minutes of easy spinning between the two 
Spin easy for another 3-8 minutes before starting the 5-minute effort. 
Complete a maximal 5-minute effort 
Spin easy for 6 minutes (5-8 minutes is okay if that's how long it takes to ride easy to the start of the 20min section of road). 
Complete your maximal 20-minute effort.  
Spin easy for 6 minutes (5-8 minutes is okay if that's how long it takes to ride easy to the start of the 1min section of road). 
Complete your maximal 1-minute effort. 
Spin easy home to finish off the day.

prospects.name: Have Fun!
prospects.description:
Today is a day to do whatever you have the energy/motivation/desire to do.  
  
There are no restrictions here aside from enjoying the day!
